questions.question: A data scientist is working on a machine learning project that requires the use of the XGBoost library. They want to use Amazon SageMaker for training and deployment. Which option would best suit their needs?
options: Create a custom container with XGBoost and its dependencies.
Use an Amazon Elastic Container Registry (Amazon ECR) container with XGBoost.
Use a SageMaker pre-built XGBoost container.
Use an Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (Amazon EKS) container with XGBoost.
correct_answers: Use an Amazon Elastic Container Registry (Amazon ECR) container with XGBoost.
